channel.title: Need help on setting up starter items....and teles
channel.description:
alrighty well i got no fucking clue lol.... ive searched the the client.java and everything how do i change???
and how do i change my tele ports?

item.title: Need help on setting up starter items....and teles
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Elementary, my dear Watson.

case 50253: c.triggerTele(2810, 3343, 0); c.killMyNPCs(); c.resetfollowers(); break;
I think by what you mean home to be shops you mean that in magic interface it says shops not home. Well to do that open up textHandler.java on server side. Search “home” and replace that with Shops. Tell me what errors you get or if I did anything wrong by mistake.

Read full topic

home

case 50253: c.triggerTele(3211, 3421, 0); c.killMyNPCs(); c.resetfollowers(); break;

i would like home to be varrock and home to be shops… i hope it makes sense…

going to bed.

item.source: Need help on setting up starter items....and teles

item.title: Need help on setting up starter items....and teles
item.dc:creator: @alpha_0nx alpha 0nx
item.description:
@alpha_0nx wrote:

okay… let’s get to work lol…

TELES
here’s how to edit where you tele to.

search for this in client.java(to change home tele):

"home"

under that will be something like

teleportToX = 2776; teleportToY = 2892;

Change the first number to the x-coordinate that your new tele will have, then change the second number to the y-coordinate that your new tele will have.

exit and save

compile, then run and it will be fixed

Starter Items
Open Client.java

search for this…

starter

underthat you will see something like this…

addItem(995, 10000000);

Change the first number to the item code you want the starter command to add to the players inventory, and the second to the ammount of the item.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help on setting up starter items....and teles
